parameters.age: Age in years at time of randomization
parameters.longestNoSmoke: The longest period of time, in days, that the patient has previously gone without smoking
parameters.grp: Randomly assigned treatment group with levels combination or patchOnly
parameters.priorAttempts: The number of prior attempts to quit smoking
parameters.yearsSmoking: Number of years the patient had been a smoker

reference: This data is from a clinical trial described in Steinberg et al. (2009)
description:
Description
Randomized trial of triple therapy vs. patch for smoking cessation.
title: pharmacoSmoking
format: A data frame with 125 observations on the following 14 variables.
